channel.title: Running Trophy Dark incursions with Trophy Gold?
channel.description: Will the expanded content of the kickstarter include advice on adapting a Trophy Dark incursion to a Trophy Gold one? Tips and procedures for expanding Rings/Moments into Sets/etc?

item.title: Running Trophy Dark incursions with Trophy Gold?
item.dc:creator: @Alexi_Sarge
item.description:
@Alexi_Sarge wrote:

It’s a work in progress, but what I’ve discussed with Jason and Jesse is a framework to include sessions of Trophy Dark in a larger Trophy Gold campaign. So something that both facilitates and incentivizes having Trophy Dark flashbacks or sidestories that tie-in to the Trophy Gold adventures your party is having. Not quite what you’re asking for, but hopefully also of interest if you like running both versions of Trophy!

Read full topic
item.source: Running Trophy Dark incursions with Trophy Gold?

item.title: Running Trophy Dark incursions with Trophy Gold?
item.dc:creator: @Jesseabe
item.description:
@Jesseabe wrote:

I know @Alexi_Sarge is writing something to allow using them together in some way, but I don’t know exactly what it will look like.

Read full topic
